<title level="1" right="Action">[Tearing Clutch](/Actions.aspx?ID=1044) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 55</row>

</column>

---

The terror bird makes a beak Strike; on a successful hit, the target takes 2d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
name: Tearing Clutch
